mapper.insert: INSERT INTO auction_result ( auction_id, account_id, final_price, created_at, confirmed, confirmed_at, canceled_reason, admin_memo, re_registered ) VALUES ( #{auctionId}, #{accountId}, #{finalPrice}, #{createdAt}, #{confirmed}, #{confirmedAt}, #{canceledReason}, #{adminMemo}, #{reRegistered} )
mapper.update: UPDATE auction_result SET account_id = #{accountId}, final_price = #{finalPrice}, confirmed = #{confirmed}, confirmed_at = #{confirmedAt}, canceled_reason = #{canceledReason}, admin_memo = #{adminMemo}, re_registered = #{reRegistered} WHERE auction_id = #{auctionId}
